item.title: Binary Image Classification with Keras in R
item.description: Binary Image Classification with Keras in R (Apple M1 Chip) The exercise is done on hardware with an Apple M1 Chip and using R interface to Keras. This means that the versions of R, Python, TensorFlow and Keras are all versions that run natively on the M1 Chip. If you prefer to use R and use an M1 mac then here are a few useful links:
